title: Mobile Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program Through European Educational Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Core Middle School Mathematics Concepts and Practical Application Experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented mobile learning environment based on European cross-country educational collaboration. Overcomes time/space constraints via smartphone-based microlearning content.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ODL (Open and Distance Learning) models used in European collaborative projects and apply them to mathematics education
Learners can solve at least three practical cases per week through mobile-based microlearning implementations
Learners achieve over 80% mastery of the European-style mathematical problem-solving framework through summative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
